template.subject: Welcome to CCIL Member Application. Your Login Details Inside.

div.p:
Your account has been successfully created, and you're now ready to access our platform. Below are your login credentials:
Username: $user_email$
Password: [Default Password]

For security purposes, we recommend changing your password after your initial login. Please follow the steps below to log in: Go to https://eidm.ccilindia.com/idmdash Enter your username and the temporary password provided above. Once logged in, please setup your secret question and answer for password recovery.

Reset your password:
If you forgot your password go to url mentioned in point 1 and click on Forgot Password and then reset password using secret question and answer setup by you. Application Access URL https://ememberportal.ccilindia.com If you encounter any issues or have any questions, feel free to reach out to idamsupport@ccilindia.co.in
